qas.question: When does the mobile library service operate?
Who provides programs to students with special needs?

context: <a1_0>The Education and Employment Directorate<a1_0/> also offers programmes for students with special needs, vocational training, adult education, evening classes, and distance learning. The island has a public library (the oldest in the Southern Hemisphere) and a mobile library service which operates <a0_0>weekly<a0_0/> rural areas.
